paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted variants in the KCNH2 gene, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Three of these mutation carriers showed QTc intervals shorter than 360 milliseconds and one experienced VF.

functional_data.summary: All KCNH2 mutations exerted gain-of-function effects on IKr channels in CHO cells.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, segregates with disease in families.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on functional assays and clinical presentation.
variants.additional_notes: Four KCNH2 mutations were identified in the study.
key_quotes: Four of these mutation carriers showed QTc intervals shorter than 360 milliseconds and one experienced VF.
Patch-clamp analyses showed that all KCNH2 mutations exerted gain-of-function effects on IKr channels in CHO cells.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted all relevant data regarding KCNH2 variants and penetrance.
